page.title: 04Playground games Ipplepen.
page.content: We have a large{tarmac}playground with a{tennis court}and{netball courts marked out on it. We play on that all the year. The{field}is used for boys' football in the{winter.}In the{summer it is used for cricket, a running track and rounders pitch is marked on it.Everyone can play on the field during the fine weather. The{boys favourite games}are tennis, soft- ball cricket, tag, football, poison adder and cricket. We borrow the table-tennis table and play on that. One special game is the "A"team. The{girls play}skipping, netball, hopscotch, tennis, poison adder, singing games,guessing games and elastics. { Everyone}likes rounders, tag or 'he' games and racing.
